commands.name: deploy
commands.trDescription:
Deploy build results to the configured device (see the 'device' configuration option).

This command implies also the 'make-install' command and unless the '--rsync' method is used, it will include also the 'package' command. See the 'building' domain help for more information about the other commands.

The following deployment methods are available, corresponding to the single mandatory option:

--pkcon
    Uses 'pkcon' to install RPM package(s). Requires the "Allow untrusted software" option enabled in Settings, does not require root access to the device.

--rsync
    Uses 'rsync' to copy the installed files under '/opt/sdk/<name>' without building/installing RPM package(s).  Does not require root access to the device.

--sdk
    Uses the method native to the SDK to install RPM package(s). Requires developer mode enabled on the device, does not require root access.

--zypper
    Uses 'zypper' to install RPM package(s).  Requires 'zypper' installed on the device, requires root access to the device.

options.name: device
options.trDescription: Select the device to use with commands that need to access a device. Registered devices can be listed with the 'device list' command.
